snippet.title: MIND: Path to Thalamus Gameplay in VR with Motion Controllers
snippet.description:
Gameplay footage of MIND: Path to Thalamus working with motion controllers on the VIVE.

Buy MIND: Path to Thalamus here! http://store.steampowered.com/app/296070
